{"id":535060267,"lang":"cpp","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1628397169,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"160 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/535060267/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Characters to Make Fancy String","memory":"41.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeFancyString(string s) {\n        string ans;\n        int n = s.size();\n        for(int i =0;i < n;i++){\n            int cnt = 1;\n            char base = s[i];\n            while(i+1<n && s[i+1] == base){\n                cnt++,i++;\n            }\n            ans += string(min(2,cnt),base);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-characters-to-make-fancy-string"}
